SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.service.maintenance

Interface MaintenanceRecordService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcMaintenanceRecordService
public interface MaintenanceRecordService
Service interface for maintenance record operations. Defines methods for managing maintenance records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    completeMaintenanceRecord(String recordId, LocalDateTime completionDate, String notes)

    • createMaintenanceRecord

      MaintenanceRecord createMaintenanceRecord(MaintenanceRecord record)
      Creates a new maintenance record.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getMaintenanceRecord

      Optional<MaintenanceRecord> getMaintenanceRecord(String recordId)
      Retrieves a maintenance record by its record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The record ID to find
      Returns:
      Optional containing the maintenance record if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • getAllMaintenanceRecords

      Retrieves all maintenance records.
      Returns:
      List of all maintenance records

    • getMaintenanceRecordsByAircraft

      List<MaintenanceRecord> getMaintenanceRecordsByAircraft(String registrationNumber)
      Retrieves maintenance records for a specific aircraft.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The aircraft registration number
      Returns:
      List of maintenance records for the specified aircraft

    • updateMaintenanceRecord

      MaintenanceRecord updateMaintenanceRecord(MaintenanceRecord record)
      Updates an existing maintenance record.
      Parameters:
      record - The maintenance record with updated information
      Returns:
      The updated maintenance record

    • updateMaintenanceStatus

      boolean updateMaintenanceStatus(String recordId, MaintenanceRecord.MaintenanceStatus status)
      Updates the status of a maintenance record.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The record ID of the maintenance record to update
      status - The new status
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • completeMaintenanceRecord

      boolean completeMaintenanceRecord(String recordId, LocalDateTime completionDate, String notes)
      Completes a maintenance record by setting its status to COMPLETED and recording the completion date.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The record ID of the maintenance record to complete
      completionDate - The date and time of completion
      notes - Optional notes about the completion
      Returns:
      true if completion was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteMaintenanceRecord

      boolean deleteMaintenanceRecord(String recordId)
      Deletes a maintenance record.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The record ID of the maintenance record to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise
